Simple Test Page

This is a simple test page for the HTML extractor. It contains basic content that should be extracted and converted to markdown.

Features

The extractor should handle:

  • Headings at multiple levels
  • Paragraphs with text
  • Lists (ordered and unordered)
  • Links and formatting

Code Examples

Here's a code example:


def hello_world():
    print("Hello, World!")
